headline: Assessing Gen Digital (GEN) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness And Cash Flow Focus
summary: Why Gen Digital is on investors’ radar With no single headline event in focus, Gen Digital (GEN) is drawing attention for its current valuation, recent share price moves and the cash flow profile investors associate with established software businesses. See our latest analysis for Gen Digital. At a share price of $25.41, Gen Digital has seen a 1 month share price return of 8.5% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of 5.76% decline, while the 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns...
